GPSmatching 0.1.0
  • Reference

GPS Matching function to create matched set.

create_matching.Rd

GPS Matching function to create matched set.

create_matching(
  Y,
  w,
  c,
  matching_fun = matching_l1,
  sl.lib = c("SL.xgboost", "SL.earth", "SL.gam", "SL.ranger"),
  scale = 0.5,
  delta_n = 1
)

Arguments

Y

a vector of observed outcome variable.
w

a vector of observed continuous exposure variable.
c

a data frame or matrix of observed covariates variable.
matching_fun

a specifed matching function (Default is "matching_l1" (Manhattan distance matching)).
sl.lib

a set of methods used for estimating GPS (Default is ("SL.xgboost","SL.earth","SL.gam","SL.ranger")).
scale

a specified scale parameter to control the relative weight that is attributed to the distance measures of the exposure versus the GPS estimates (Default is 0.5).
delta_n

a specified caliper parameter on the exposure (Default is 1).

Value

matched_set: The function returns a data.table saved the constructed matched set by the proposed GPS matching approaches.
